name: Hotori
text: On Play: You may play 1 [Kotori] from your hand: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.

effect.text: You may play 1 [Kotori] from your hand: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.
